column2: "That child is with Clarissa! But why...!?"
"Big sis lent me this shiny rod... but big sis is all alone!"
"I'm feeling better, so please! Please take this back to her!"
"You gotta save her! I'm begging you!"
"Requesting assistance. A young woman is engaged in combat deep within the city... please guide me to her."
"Fascinating. So White Tin Clarissa can be temporarily transferred, and then there's the child who received her protection... Hmm...."
"I must say, you've got quite the luck, to be the sole survivor of this horrible tragedy."
"Yes, stronger. Imagine being able to save big sis, and everyone else with your great strength."
"Brave little lady, would you grant me the honor of telling me your name?"
